sentence.Network_en: The Caster summons a Wyvern and binds it to his service.
sentence.Network_cn: 法师召唤一只双足飞龙,并使其为自己服务.

sentence.Network_en: Other note : Wyvern Sting may now be used in combat.
sentence.Network_cn: 翼龙钉刺可以在战斗中使用?噢也.新打法.

sentence.Network_en: The Wyvern is a large, scaly beast with leathery wings and a poison stinger.
sentence.Network_cn: 双足飞龙是一种庞大 、 有鳞的野兽,还长着翅膀和一根毒刺.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 战斗装甲钢羽_百度百科 ... 哥萨克（ COSSACK） 北约代号：双足飞龙（ wyvern） 北约代号：瓷器（ warer）.
代表智慧的飞龙（wyvern）(Wyvern)的必杀技是“宇宙魔方(Cosmic Cube)”。代表力量的狮子(Leo)的必杀技是“飞行陨石(Flying Rock)”。
翼龙（WYVERN） 恶魔特性：除非另有说明，绝大多数的恶魔都拥有以下特性。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting a viper): from Old French wivre, from Latin vipera

means.word_mean: 1. a fire-breathing dragon used in medieval heraldry; had the head of a dragon and the tail of a snake and a body with wings and two legs
